scripts.test:init: cd ../cordova-plugin-zoop-test-runner && npm install && cordova platform add android
scripts.test: cd ../cordova-plugin-zoop-test-runner && cordova plugin remove cordova-plugin-zoop-tests cordova-plugin-zoop & cordova plugin add ../cordova-plugin-zoop ../cordova-plugin-zoop/tests && cordova run android
scripts.build: cd ../cordova-plugin-zoop-test-runner && cordova plugin remove cordova-plugin-zoop-tests cordova-plugin-zoop & cordova plugin add ../cordova-plugin-zoop ../cordova-plugin-zoop/tests && cordova prepare android
